title: I have a google pixel phone that was my sons bought a year or so ago and i have just taken it over. It has hardly been used as he is a disabled person and found iphone better for voice activated services. When making p.hone calls the phone is getting really hot too hot to hold at my ear. I have tried shutting it down and restarting but this has not solved the problem.
content: Tried rebooting and did not work
